mapper.select: select mov_board.*, count(comm_num) board_comm_cnt from mov_board left join mov_comm on board_num = comm_board group by board_num order by board_group desc, board_step limit #{StartNo}, #{rowsize}
select b.*, mem.mem_img from mov_board b join mov_member mem on b.board_writer = mem.mem_id where board_num = #{bnum}
mapper.update: update mov_board set board_hit = board_hit+1 where board_num = #{bnum}
update mov_board set board_comm_cnt = board_comm_cnt+1 where board_num = #{bnum}
update mov_board set board_comm_cnt = board_comm_cnt-#{cnt} where board_num = #{bnum}
mapper.insert: insert into mov_board values(#{board_num}, #{board_category}, #{board_title}, #{board_cont}, now(), #{board_writer}, default, #{board_num}, default, default)
mapper.update: update mov_board set board_category = #{board_category}, board_title = #{board_title}, board_cont = #{board_cont} where board_num = #{board_num}
mapper.insert: insert into mov_board(board_category, board_title, board_cont, board_regdate, board_writer, board_hit, board_comm_cnt, board_group, board_step, board_indent) values(#{board_category}, #{board_title}, #{board_cont}, now(), #{board_writer}, default, default, #{board_group}, #{board_step}+1, #{board_indent}+1)
mapper.update: update mov_board set board_step = board_step+1 where board_step > #{board_step} and board_group = #{board_group}
mapper.select: select * from mov_board where board_category like #{keyword} order by board_group desc, board_step limit #{startNum},#{rowsize}
select * from mov_board where board_cont like #{keyword} order by board_group desc, board_step limit #{startNum},#{rowsize}
select * from mov_board where board_writer like #{keyword} order by board_group desc, board_step limit #{startNum},#{rowsize}
select count(*) from mov_board where board_category like #{keyword}
select count(*) from mov_board where board_cont like #{keyword}
select count(*) from mov_board where board_writer like #{keyword}
select count(*) from mov_board where board_writer = #{mem_id}
select * from mov_board where board_writer = #{mem_id} order by board_regdate desc limit ${startnum},${rowsize}
